TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChannelDispatcherCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase>
Public Class ChannelDispatcherCollection Inherits SynchronizedCollection(Of ChannelDispatcherBase)

Docs.summary: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains channel dispatchers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This collection is used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> to manage the channel dispatchers associated with the host. A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherCollection> is created when <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.%23ctor%2A> is called and the collection can be accessed using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A> property.
The collection contains <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> objects (and not just instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>) because it is also used by developers who want to keep the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF)programming model but replace the system-provided runtime. They derive a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> and extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> (which inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>) by overriding <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.InitializeRuntime%2A>, adding instances of the class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A>.
This class has no public constructors and is not intended to be used outside of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.

The channel dispatcher to be inserted into the collection as an element.

Docs.exception: The service host associated with the channel dispatcher collection is closed.
The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The commutation object is not in a state
